alert.note: Alert for Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Ynez Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 06 at 7:46PM PST until January 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 30 possible. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast, Santa Ynez Valley, Lake Casitas and Ojai Valley. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM PST Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Ynez Valley
